metadata.description: Comics legend Alex Toth’s pièce de résistance, the complete Dell adventures of Zorro is finally available in a full color archival hardcover reprint!  Toth, who defined how action/adventure stories are told, set the standard for comic books with his Zorro tales.  Cited by comic book artists, historians, and fans as some of Toth’s best work, these stories have been painstakingly digitally reconstructed to look better than the original Dell comic books in this deluxe reprint.
metadata.name: Alex Toth's Zorro The Complete Dell Comics Adventures
